        Generate next generation sequencing (NGS/HTS) reads.
        Parameters:
        referenceFile - reference file, if any
        readFile - read file, if any
        random - random generator, must not be null
        length - length distribution, must not be null
        quality - quality strategy, must not be null
        coverage - coverage strategy, must not be null
        mutationRate - mutation rate
        mutation - mutation strategy, must not be null
